about-description-1: I am Gautier, a dedicated Data Engineer with a proven track record in designing and optimizing scalable data pipelines. With strong expertise in Python, SQL, and Pandas, I specialize in transforming complex datasets into actionable insights.
about-description-2: I have successfully led the development and maintenance of robust ETL processes, ensuring data integrity and efficiency across diverse environments. As a proactive problem-solver, I thrive in collaborative Agile teams, continuously seeking to refine and innovate data engineering practices.
about-description-3: I'm excited to leverage my skills in tackling new challenges across various industries, delivering impactful data-driven solutions.
experience-sancare-point-1: Spearheaded the design and upkeep of Python data pipelines in a Docker environment, optimizing ETL processes for medtech data extraction.
experience-sancare-point-2: Proactively led code refactoring to enhance efficiency, scalability, and maintainability of data pipelines, leveraging Pandas, Python, and SQL. Ensured adherence to PEP8 standards and SOLID principles.
experience-sancare-point-3: Collaborated closely with cross-functional Agile teams to translate complex medical data requirements into actionable insights.
experience-sancare-point-4: Ensured compliance with healthcare data standards (FHIR, OMOP-CDM), enhancing data interoperability and management.
experience-sancare-point-5: Played a key role in troubleshooting and resolving data-related issues, improving data integrity and quality. Actively monitored and integrated new technologies to enhance the data engineering stack's efficiency.
experience-foch-point-1: Developed a digitized data collection tool for improving ENT consultations using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Python backend.
experience-foch-point-2: Implemented Machine Learning clustering to identify patient groups, enhancing data-driven decision-making.
experience-foch-point-3: Performed extensive data preprocessing, including cleaning and normalization, ensuring high-quality analysis.
experience-foch-point-4: Contributed to a scientific publication based on the project outcomes. (Check it out here) =>
education-esme-title: ESME (Special School of Mechanics and Electricity)
methodologies-cicd: Experienced in continuous integration and continuous delivery pipelines, automating code deployment.
methodologies-tdd: Skilled in writing tests before code to ensure quality and functionality.
